title: The Vision of William Blake (TEFC)
creator_credit: Guy Brenton, British Film Institute Experimental Film Fund and Morse Films
brief_description: Filmed in four museums that contain major collections of Blake’s writings and paintings, this documentary by Guy Brenton explores the anguish of Blake’s prophetic world, Music by Ralph Vaughan Williams, and narration and poems read by Bernard Miles and Robert Speight.
creator_credit_for_label: Guy Brenton, British Film Institute Experimental Film Fund and Morse Films
